description:
Microsoft SQL Server 2016 Express LocalDB is a feature of [SQL Server Express](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ms144275(SQL.130).aspx) targeted to developers. It is available on SQL Server 2016 Express with Advanced Services.

SqlLocalDB utility to create an instance of MicrosoftSQL Server 2016 Express LocalDB. The SqlLocalDB utility (SqlLocalDB.exe) is a simple command line tool to enable users and developers to create and manage an instance of SQL Server Express LocalDB. For information about how to use LocalDB
summary: Install Microsoft SQL Server 2016 Express LocalDB.
author: Microsoft
